name: Web Development
description: Learn the essentials of building websites and web applications. Cover topics such as HTML, CSS, and front-end and back-end development.

name: Python Programming
description: Explore the versatile and powerful Python programming language. Cover topics ranging from basic syntax to advanced concepts and applications.

name: JavaScript Frameworks
description: Dive into modern JavaScript frameworks and libraries like React, Angular, and Vue.js. Build dynamic and interactive user interfaces for web applications.

name: Mobile App Development
description: Discover the world of mobile app development. Learn how to create native or cross-platform mobile apps using technologies like React Native or Flutter.

name: Data Science and Machine Learning
description: Explore the field of data science and machine learning. Learn how to analyze and interpret data, build predictive models, and apply machine learning algorithms.
